00019 template <class T>
00020 CArray2D<T>::CArray2D()
00021 {
00022         m_Width = 0;
00023         m_Height = 0;
00024         m_pData = NULL;
00025         m_Origin=EMPTY;
00026 }
00027 
00028 template <class T>
00029 CArray2D<T>::CArray2D(UINT32 x, UINT32 y)
00030 {
00031         m_pData=NULL;
00032         Alloc(x,y);
00033 }
00034 
00035 template <class T>
00036 CArray2D<T>::~CArray2D()
00037 {
00038         Empty();
00039 }
00040 
00041 template <class T>
00042 CArray2D<T>::CArray2D(const CArray2D<T>& M)
00043 {
00044         // copy constructor
00045         m_pData=NULL;
00046         *this=M;
00047 }
00048 
00049 template <class T>
00050 void CArray2D<T>::Empty()
00051 {
00052         if (m_pData!=NULL)
00053                 delete m_pData;
00054         m_pData=NULL;
00055         m_Width = 0;
00056         m_Height = 0;
00057         m_Origin=EMPTY;
00058 }
00059 
00060 template <class T>
00061 bool CArray2D<T>::Alloc(UINT32 x, UINT32 y)
00062 {
00063         Empty();
00064         m_Width = x;
00065         m_Height = y;
00066         m_Origin=RAM;
00067         if ((m_pData = new valarray<T>(x*y)) != NULL)
00068                 return true;
00069         else
00070         {
00071                 ostringstream ost;
00072                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::Alloc() Failed allocating data" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00073                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00074                 return false;
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 template <class T>
00079 UINT32 CArray2D<T>::Size() const
00080 {
00081         return m_Width*m_Height;
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <class T>
00085 bool CArray2D<T>::CopySubArray(const CArray2D<T>& Source,unsigned int xmin,unsigned int ymin,
00086                                                            unsigned int xmax,unsigned int ymax)
00087 {
00088         CArray2D<T>* pTarget=this;
00089         bool Copy=false;
00090         /* Not optimised regarding speed! */
00091         if ((xmin<xmax) && (ymin<ymax) &&
00092                 (xmax<=Source.GetWidth()) && (ymax<=Source.GetHeight()))
00093         {
00094                 /* Check if the source and destination is the same array */
00095                 if (&Source==this)
00096                 {
00097                         pTarget=new CArray2D<T>(xmax-xmin+1,ymax-ymin+1);
00098                         Copy=true;
00099                 }
00100                 else if ((pTarget->GetWidth()!=Source.GetWidth()) || (pTarget->GetHeight()!=Source.GetHeight()))
00101                 {
00102                         pTarget->Alloc(xmax-xmin+1,ymax-ymin+1);
00103                 }
00104                 unsigned int i,j;
00105                 /* copy cells */
00106                 for(i=ymin; i<=ymax; i++)
00107                         for(j=xmin; j<=xmax; j++)
00108                                 (*pTarget)[j-xmin][i-ymin]=Source[j][i];
00109 
00110                 if (Copy==true)
00111         {
00112                         *this=*pTarget;
00113                         delete pTarget;
00114         }
00115                 return true;
00116         }
00117         else
00118         {
00119                 ostringstream ost;
00120                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::CopySubArray() Illegal clipping rectangel" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00121                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00122                 return false;
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 template <class T>
00127 bool CArray2D<T>::Load(const char* pPathAndFileName)
00128 {
00129         ifstream s(pPathAndFileName);
00130         if (s.is_open()==true)
00131         {
00132                 Empty(); // delete all contents
00133                 string str;
00134                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00135                 s >> str;
00136                 if (str!=string("CArray2D"))
00137                 {
00138                         ostringstream ost;
00139                         ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'CArray2D' in beginning of file" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00140                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00141                         s.close();
00142                         return false;
00143                 }
00144                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00145                 s >> str;
00146                 if (str!=string("Dimensions:"))
00147                 {
00148                         ostringstream ost;
00149                         ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'Dimensions:'" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00150                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00151                         s.close();
00152                         return false;
00153                 }
00154                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00155                 s >> m_Width;
00156                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00157                 s >> m_Height;
00158                 Alloc(m_Width,m_Height);
00159                 for(unsigned int y=0; y<GetHeight(); y++)
00160                 {
00161                         for(unsigned int x=0; x<GetWidth(); x++)
00162                         {
00163                                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00164                                 //operator[](x)[y] << s;
00165                                 s >> operator[](x)[y];
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168                 m_Origin=DISC;
00169                 return true;
00170         }
00171         else
00172         {
00173                 ostringstream ost;
00174                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Failed opening file: " << pPathAndFileName << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00175                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00176                 return false;
00177         }
00178 }
00179 
00180 template <class T>
00181 bool CArray2D<T>::Save(const char* pPathAndFileName)
00182 {
00183         ofstream s(pPathAndFileName);
00184         if (s.is_open()==true)
00185         {
00186                 s << "# Data from a CArray2D object in IPL98" << endl;
00187                 s << "CArray2D" << endl;
00188                 s << "Dimensions: " << GetWidth() << " " << GetHeight() << endl;
00189                 for(unsigned int y=0; y<GetHeight(); y++)
00190                 {
00191                         for(unsigned int x=0; x<GetWidth(); x++)
00192                         {
00193                                 s << operator[](x)[y];
00194                                 s << " ";
00195                         }
00196                         s << "\n";
00197                 }
00198                 return true;
00199         }
00200         else
00201         {
00202                 ostringstream ost;
00203                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::Save() Failed opening file: " << pPathAndFileName << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00204                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00205                 return false;
00206         }
00207 }

00209 template <class T>
00210 bool CArray2D<T>::CopySubArray(const CArray2D<T>& Source,const CPoint2D<unsigned int >& UpperLeft,
00211                                                            const CPoint2D<unsigned int >& LowerRight)
00212 {
00213         return CopySubArray(Source, UpperLeft.GetX(),UpperLeft.GetY(),LowerRight.GetX(),
00214                                         LowerRight.GetY());
00215 }

00217 template <class T>
00218 void CArray2D<T>::Rotate90(int Steps)
00219 {
00220         CArray2D<T> Source(*this);
00221         unsigned int x,y;
00222         int MaxYIndex=m_Height-1;
00223         int MaxXIndex=m_Width-1;
00224         int ActSteps=(Steps % 4);
00225         if (ActSteps<0)
00226                 ActSteps=4+ActSteps;
00227 
00228         if (m_Origin==EMPTY)
00229         {
00230                 ostringstream ost;
00231                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::Rotate90() Array is empty - doing nothing" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00232                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_WARNING,ost.str().c_str());
00233                 return;
00234         }
00235         if (ActSteps==0)
00236                 return;
00237 
00238         /* rotate array */
00239         if (ActSteps==1)
00240         {
00241                 for(y=0; y<m_Height; y++)
00242                         for(x=0; x<m_Width; x++)
00243                                 operator[](MaxYIndex-y)[x]=Source[x][y];
00244         }
00245         else if (ActSteps==2)
00246         {
00247                 for(y=0; y<m_Height; y++)
00248                         for(x=0; x<m_Width; x++)
00249                                 operator[](x)[MaxYIndex-y]=Source[x][y];
00250         }
00251         else if (ActSteps==3)
00252         {
00253                 for(y=0; y<m_Height; y++)
00254                         for(x=0; x<m_Width; x++)
00255                                 operator[](y)[MaxXIndex-x]=Source[x][y];
00256         }
00257 }
00258 
00259 template <class T>
00260 void CArray2D<T>::FlipHorisontal()
00261 {
00262         CArray2D<T> Source(*this);
00263         unsigned int x,y;
00264         int MaxYIndex=m_Height-1;
00265         if (m_Origin==EMPTY)
00266         {
00267                 ostringstream ost;
00268                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::FlipHorisontal() Array is empty - doing nothing" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00269                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_WARNING,ost.str().c_str());
00270                 return;
00271         }
00272         /* flip image */
00273         for(y=0; y<m_Height; y++)
00274                 for(x=0; x<m_Width; x++)
00275                         operator[](x)[MaxYIndex-y]=Source[x][y];
00276 }
00277 
00278 template <class T>
00279 void CArray2D<T>::FlipVertical()
00280 {
00281         CArray2D<T> Source(*this);
00282         unsigned int x,y;
00283         int MaxXIndex=m_Width-1;
00284         if (m_Origin==EMPTY)
00285         {
00286                 ostringstream ost;
00287                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::FlipVertical() Array is empty - doing nothing" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00288                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_WARNING,ost.str().c_str());
00289                 return;
00290         }
00291         /* flip image */
00292         for(y=0; y<m_Height; y++)
00293                 for(x=0; x<m_Width; x++)
00294                         operator[](MaxXIndex-x)[y]=Source[x][y];
00295 }
00296 
00297 template <class T>
00298 bool CArray2D<T>::CopyDisplace(int dx,int dy)
00299 {
00300         if (m_Origin!=EMPTY)
00301         {
00302                 int x,y,w,h,xd,yd;
00303                 CArray2D<T> Source(*this);
00304                 w=m_Width;
00305                 h=m_Height;
00306                 for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00307                 {
00308                         for (x=0;x<w;x++)
00309                         {
00310                                 xd=x-dx;
00311                                 yd=y-dy;
00312                                 while (xd<0) xd+=w;
00313                                 while (xd>=w) xd-=w;
00314                                 while (yd<0) yd+=h;
00315                                 while (yd>=h) yd-=h;
00316                                 operator[](xd)[yd]=Source[x][y];
00317                         }
00318                 }
00319                 return true;
00320         } 
00321         else
00322         {
00323                 ostringstream ost;
00324                 ost << "CArray2D<T>::CopyDisplace() Array is empty - doing nothing" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00325                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_WARNING,ost.str().c_str());
00326                 return false;
00327         }
00328 }

00330 
00331 template <class T>
00332 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s, const CArray2D<T>& Array)
00333 {
00334         s << "Dimensions: " << Array.GetWidth() << " " << Array.GetHeight() << endl;
00335         for(int y=0; y<Array.GetHeight(); y++)
00336         {
00337                 for(int x=0; x<Array.GetWidth(); x++)
00338                         s << Array[x][y] << " ";
00339                 s << "\n";
00340         }
00341         return s;
00342 }
